lineofelendil = {
	name = Elendil # High King of the Dúnedain-in-Exile, founder of Arnor
 
	dynasty = dynasty_elendil		
	religion = faith_edain
	culture = dunedain
	dna = elendil_dna
	
	father = lineofelatan19
	
	martial = 14
	prowess = 14
	
	trait = lifestyle_blademaster
	trait = education_martial_4
	trait = just
	trait = brave
	trait = diligent
 	trait = born_on_numenor

	trait = blood_of_numenor_10
	3711.4.3 = {
		birth = yes		
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
			learn_language = language_quenya
		}	
	    give_nickname = nick_the_tall
        effect = {
            add_character_flag = {
                flag = had_nickname_event
            }
        }
	}
	
	3795.2.21 = {
		add_spouse = wifeofelendil
	}
	
	4033.7.12 = { # Slain by Sauron in the Last Alliance			
		death = { 		
			death_reason = death_duel	
			killer = lineofsauron
		}
	}
}

 	trait = born_on_numenor

	trait = blood_of_numenor_10
	3713.2.12 = {
		birth = yes		
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
			learn_language = language_quenya
		}	
	}
	4013.3.22 = {
		death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes	}
	}
}

	}
}

lineisildur19 = {
	name = Arveleg # Held the Weather Hills for many years against Angmar and Rhudaur through careful strategy and use of the Palantir of Amon Sûl
 
	dynasty_house = house_isildur			
	religion = faith_edain
	culture = arnorian
	dna = arveleg_i_dna

	father = lineisildur18			
	mother = lineforo1131
	sexuality = heterosexual
	
	trait = intellect_good_2
	trait = gregarious
	trait = diligent
	trait = brave
	trait = education_martial_4
	trait = strategist
	trait = unyielding_defender # Defended the Weather Hills stoutly
	trait = blood_of_numenor_7
		
	diplomacy = 7
    martial = 10
    stewardship = 3
    intrigue = 2
    learning = 4
    prowess = 10

	5342.7.3 = {
		birth = yes			
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
		}
	}
	5379.2.4 = { #Their first meeting upon the shores of Lake Nenuial
		set_relation_crush = character:lineoftarmea31sister
	}
	5381.5.28 = {
        effect = {
            create_betrothal = character:lineoftarmea31sister
		}
    }
	5423.6.14 = {
		add_spouse = lineoftarmea31sister
		set_relation_soulmate = character:lineoftarmea31sister
	}
	5442.5.22 = { # Fell in the fall of Amon Sûl
		death = { death_reason = death_battle }
	}
}
lineisildur20 = {
	name = Araphor # The Valiant, who repulsed Angmar and avenged his father's death, second longest reigning king of Arnor (after Valandil)
 
	dynasty_house = house_isildur			
	religion = faith_edain
	culture = arnorian

	father = lineisildur19	
	mother = lineoftarmea31sister
 
    diplomacy = 5
    martial = 12
    stewardship = 6
    intrigue = 3
    learning = 6
    prowess = 12

	trait = zealous
	trait = diligent
	trait = vengeful
	trait = education_martial_4
	trait = aggressive_attacker # Forced Angmar from Arthedain and Cardolan
	trait = blood_of_numenor_7
	
	5424.3.20 = {
		birth = yes		
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
		}	
	}
	
	5442.8.1= { # Befriends Orchaldor of Eketya in the war. 
		effect = {
			set_relation_friend = { target = character:lineofeketya75 }
		}
	}
	
	5445.1.1 = { # For his victories and valor against Angmar
		give_nickname = nick_the_valiant
        add_spouse = lineofcaladir47 # Marries the last Princess of Cardolan (as had been agreed upon by their families, but both also come to love one another dearly)
        effect = {
            set_relation_soulmate = character:lineofcaladir47
        }
	}
 
	5622.9.29 = {
		death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }	
	}
}

	6008.12.24 = { # Drowned in the Ice-bay of Forochel
		death = { death_reason = death_drowned }		
	}
}

lineisildur42 = {
	name = Aragorn ### II, Elessar, High King of the Reunited Kingdom			
 
	dynasty_house = house_isildur			
	religion = faith_edain
	culture = dunedain_ranger			
	sexuality = heterosexual			
	dna = aragorn_dna_4			
 
	father = lineisildur41			
	mother = linegilraen1			
 
	diplomacy = 10			
	martial = 12		
	stewardship = 10			
	intrigue = 08			
	learning = 10			
	prowess = 10		
 
				
	trait = education_martial_4	
    trait = rough_terrain_expert
    trait = education_martial_prowess_4

	trait = lifestyle_blademaster
	trait = lifestyle_traveler
    trait = lifestyle_physician

	trait = physique_good_2			
	trait = intellect_good_2

	trait = compassionate			
	trait = just			
	trait = brave	

	trait = celibate			
	trait = cannot_marry

    trait = blood_of_numenor_6

	6964.3.1 = {
		birth = yes					
		effect = {	
			add_character_flag = is_aragorn
			add_character_flag = ai_immune_to_mental_breaks
			add_character_flag = has_scripted_appearance	
			add_character_flag = immune_to_disease

			learn_language = language_sindarin
            learn_language = language_quenya
            add_trait_xp = {
                 trait = lifestyle_traveler
                 track = travel
                 value = 100
            }
            add_trait_xp = {
                 trait = lifestyle_blademaster
                 value = 100
            }
		}
		add_character_flag = {	
			flag = can_not_marry	
			years = 90	
		}	
		add_character_flag = aragorn		
	}
	6976.3.1 = { # Elrond and young Aragorn become friends
		effect = {
			set_relation_friend = { reason = friend_pedagogy target = character:linefinwe27 }
            add_trait_xp = {
                trait = lifestyle_physician
                value = 10
            }
		}
	}
	6980.3.1 = { # Aragorn becomes befriends Elladan and Elrohir
		effect = {
			set_relation_friend = { target = character:linefinwe28 }
			set_relation_friend = { target = character:linefinwe29 }
		}
	}
    6990.1.1 = { # End of Aragorn's service in the south as Thorongil
        add_prestige = 4500
    }
	7174.1.1 = {
		death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes } 		
	}
}

#####################
### House Caladir ###
#####################
# Greatest of the houses of Cardolan, House Caladir was established in 2335 by Calatar, a minor noble of Andustar. Falling in love with a local Eriadorim woman 
# in his time in the colonies, he wed her and return to Numenor, but was met with scorn and was basically blocked from the court, derided for his lowly marriage.
# Smarting, Calatar decided to return to the colonies in the future lands of Cardolan. Using his wife's local connections and his own considerable wealth, he 
# built a palatial complex in Argond, and swiftly established himself as the pre-eminent colonial lord of the region which would one day bear his houses name,
# Dol Caladir. 
#
# In time house Caladir became a kingmaker in colonial and then Arnorian politics, their allegiance vital to the control of Cardolan. King Valandil of Arnor's queen, 
# Finduilas, came from house Caladir, and the line would become the Princes of Cardolan after the death of King Tarantor of Cardolan. 

lineofcaladir1 = { # Calatar, founder of house Caladir
	name = Calatar
		
	dynasty = dynasty_caladir
	religion = faith_numenorean	
	culture = numenorean	
		
	trait = education_stewardship_4
		
	trait = ambitious
	trait = stubborn
	trait = brave
	trait = born_on_numenor

	trait = blood_of_numenor_10
	2878.6.30 = {
		birth = yes
	}

	2911.1.1 = { # Falling in love with a local woman in his travels, Calatar marries her and returns to Numenor
		add_spouse = linecaladir1eriadorimwife
	}

	# 2927 - S.A. 2335. After the ridicule and humiliation of the Numenorean court, Calatar returns to middle-earth and founds Argond.
		
	3145.8.12 = {
		death = {
            death_reason = death_natural_causes
        }
	}
}

###########################
#### House of Cerentir ####
###########################

# Only arriving in Cardolan just prior to the Downfall, House Cerentir was appointed by Elendil himself as the watchemen and guardians of the Tyrn Hodhath.
# Being held in high reverence, the Barrow-Downs had long been a contested place between the various settler families and Eriadorim. Appealing to Elendil, the High-King elected to entrust the region to 
# an appointed castellan, with the lands nominally part of the Royal Demense. Hirgond was a young, scholarly man of minor noblility Faithful who had fled Numenor in order to escapes the growing furor and persecution of
# the faithful. Deeply pious, the young man gravitated to the Barrow-downs, where he made long study and became well known in the region, as well as showning himself as being wise and of sober judgement.
# As a result, despite his youth, Elendil appointed him to the position of Castellan of Tyrn Hodhath, and it became customary for his descendants to take the position after him. The house became renowned for
# their neutrality in terms of access to the Barrows, as even after the sundering of Arnor, the barrows were kept open and accessible to all.

    name = Hirgond

    dynasty = dynasty_cerentir
    religion = faith_edain
    culture = dunedain

    sexuality = heterosexual

    

    trait = just
    trait = zealous
    trait = diligent
    trait = scholar
    trait = lifestyle_mystic

    diplomacy = 9
    martial = 5
    stewardship = 2
    intrigue = 4
    learning = 4
    prowess = 8

    trait = education_learning_4


	trait = blood_of_numenor_10

        birth = yes

##In 1349, Argeleb I claimed all Arnor as the last male-line descendant of Isildur## 

## Line of Rhudaur ##		
# TA 861-951		
linerhudaur1 = { # First King of Rhudaur, Galadhion was known as a vigorous and ambitious king
	name = Galadhion #Sindarin equivalent of Aldarion
		
	dynasty_house = house_rhudaur	
	religion = faith_edain	
	culture = arnorian	
    
		
	father = lineisildur11	
	
	trait = just
	trait = ambitious
	trait = diligent
		
		

	trait = blood_of_numenor_8
	4778.1.1 = {
		birth = 4778.1.1 #861
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
		}
	}
		
	4984.1.1 = {
		death = 4984.1.1 #951
	}
}	
#####TA 951-988
linerhudaur2 = {	
	name = Orodreth	
		
	dynasty_house = house_rhudaur	
	religion = faith_edain	
	culture = arnorian	
		
	father = linerhudaur1	
		
		
		

	trait = blood_of_numenor_7
	4915.1.1 = {
		birth = 4915.1.1
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
		}
	}
		
	5021.1.1 = {
		death = 5021.1.1			  ###988
	}
}
#####TA 988-1031	
linerhudaur3 = { # Elenethron the Strong, who led the Rhudaurim against both Cardolan and Arthedain. It is from him that the later Ruadcara would claim descent
	name = Elenthorn
		
	dynasty_house = house_rhudaur	
	religion = faith_edain	
	culture = arnorian	
		
	father = linerhudaur2	
	
	trait = education_martial_3
	trait = brave
	trait = ambitious
	trait = wrathful
	trait = strong
		
		

	trait = blood_of_numenor_7
	4955.7.7 = {
		birth = 4955.1.1
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
		}
	}
		
	5064.1.1 = {
		death = 5064.1.1 ###1031
	}
}
#####TA 1031-1107
linerhudaur4 = { # Edhelion the Scholar, he was renowned for spending more time in Imladris than in his own capital, and only reluctantly married and had his son Forodagnir. Many propose his late marriage and relative lack of attention for his son led to the later flaws of Forodagnir
	name = Edhelion	# Eldarion 
		
	dynasty_house = house_rhudaur	
	religion = faith_edain	
	culture = arnorian	
		
	father = linerhudaur3	
	
	trait = scholar
	trait = education_learning_3
	trait = shy
	trait = temperate
	trait = cynical
		
		

	trait = blood_of_numenor_7
	4983.2.30 = {
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
		}
	}
		
	5140.1.1 = { # 1107 T.A.
		death = yes 
	}
}
#####TA 1107-1176	
linerhudaur5 = { # Elmanadh the Indulgent, a weak king of Rhudaur who focused more on courtly ritual and his own pleasures than on governance. Proclaimed himself as 'Forodagnir' after driving off encroaching Angmarin peasants in the north. Slain and usurped by Ruadcara
	name = Elmanadh #Later known as Forodagnir/Forodacil 
		
	dynasty_house = house_rhudaur	
	religion = faith_edain	
	culture = arnorian	
		
	father = linerhudaur4

	trait = lazy
	trait = gluttonous
	trait = forgiving
		
		
		

	trait = blood_of_numenor_7
	5102.7.4 = { # Born as Elmanadh of Rhudaur, 'Star-Fortune'
		birth = yes
		effect = {
			learn_language = language_sindarin
		}
	}

	5188.4.22 = { # Names himself 'North-Victor' after driving off encroaching Angmarin on the northern border and the Trollshaws. This self-aggrandizement infuriates many Hillmen chiefs, who feel he did little while they fought off the invaders.
		name = Forodagnir # North-Victor
	}
		
	5209.1.1 = { # 1176 - Ruadcara the Hill-King claims the throne of Rhudaur, slaying Forodagnir
		death = { 
			death_reason = death_duel
			killer = lineruadcara
		}
	}
}

### Noble Hyarromenyar, Duchy of Hyarromenya ###

lineofhyarromenyar0 = { # A companion of Elendil, he is appointed Lord of Hyarromenya after the land is ceded by the Sirrandrai

### Noble Aranborionath, rulers of Evendim, descended from a younger brother or Aranarth ###

lineofaranbor1 = {
    name = Aranbor

	dynasty_house = house_isildur	
    religion = faith_edain
    culture = arnorian
	
	father = lineisildur26			
	mother = lineofanarion44	

    

    trait = gregarious
    trait = wrathful
    trait = honest

################################################
### Noble House of Endril (Hithaeglir Harad) ###
################################################
lineendril1 = {
    name = Isilwen
    female = yes

    dynasty = dynasty_endril
    religion = faith_numenorean
    culture = dunedain

    sexuality = heterosexual

    

    trait = ambitious
    trait = wrathful
    trait = brave

    diplomacy = 5
    martial = 7
    stewardship = 5
    intrigue = 2
    learning = 4
    prowess = 7

    trait = education_martial_3

	trait = born_on_numenor
	trait = blood_of_numenor_10
    3687.12.23 = {
        birth = yes
    }

    3756.3.19 = {
		give_nickname = nick_the_fury
        add_matrilineal_spouse = lineendril2
    }

    3928.7.23 = {
        death = { death_reason = death_natural_causes }
    }
}

lineendril2 = {
    name = Elecar

    religion = faith_numenorean
    culture = dunedain

    sexuality = heterosexual

    

    trait = craven
    trait = callous
    trait = forgiving

    diplomacy = 6
    martial = 2
    stewardship = 5
    intrigue = 5
    learning = 3

# Descendents of Edhellos, sister of Amlaith, and Gwaeron, Exiled Duke of Eketya. 
# They were banished in a fit of paranoia by Amlaith and fled to Cardolan, where they were granted rule of a county in the South Downs
# They became some of the greatest opponnents of Arthedain, and were instrumental in many later conflicts
